levels.description:
Passive: Drones may be deployed on ranged tiles, dealing AoE physical damage. 
Active: Magallan and her drones gain <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> ATK, and <@ba.vup>increases</> the AoE of drones' attacks. <@ba.rem>Retreats all drones after this effect ends.</>
